text: yumogmin gaundeneun hananimgwa naeseleul mid-eo geudeul-i bachin geos-eulo hananimkke gakkai halyeohago geugeos-eulo seonjijaui gidoleul wonhaneun ideul i issnani geugeos-eun god geudeul-ege gakkai iss-eumyeo hananim-eun geudeul-eul geu bun-ui eunhye sog-e deul-eogage halini hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungman ha sim-ila
